languages.text: "...но жаль упускать возможность испробовать в деле способности членов вашей свиты". {n}Джай бросает взгляд через плечо.{/n}
"However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}
languages.original_text: "...но жаль упускать возможность испробовать в деле способности членов вашей свиты". {n}Джай бросает взгляд через плечо.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

traits.locale_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: « Mais il serait dommage de ne pas profiter de cette occasion pour laisser certains membres de votre entourage nous faire une démonstration de leurs talents, » {n}ajoute-t-elle en regardant par-dessus son épaule.{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Mais il serait dommage de ne pas profiter de cette occasion pour laisser certains membres de votre entourage nous faire une démonstration de leurs talents, » {n}ajoute-t-elle en regardant par-dessus son épaule.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Wollt Ihr wirklich die Gelegenheit versäumen, die Fähigkeiten gewisser Mitglieder Eures Gefolges mit eigenen Augen zu erleben? Das wäre doch eine Schande." {n}Jae blickt sich über die Schulter.{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Wollt Ihr wirklich die Gelegenheit versäumen, die Fähigkeiten gewisser Mitglieder Eures Gefolges mit eigenen Augen zu erleben? Das wäre doch eine Schande." {n}Jae blickt sich über die Schulter.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: «Sin embargo, sería una lástima dejar pasar la ocasión de ver las habilidades de ciertos miembros de su séquito en acción». {n}Jae mira por encima del hombro.{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Sin embargo, sería una lástima dejar pasar la ocasión de ver las habilidades de ciertos miembros de su séquito en acción». {n}Jae mira por encima del hombro.{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: 「だけど、アンタのとあるお仲間の実際の腕を拝めるチャンスを逃すのは残念だね」{n}ジェイは肩越しにチラっと視線を送る。{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「だけど、アンタのとあるお仲間の実際の腕を拝めるチャンスを逃すのは残念だね」{n}ジェイは肩越しにチラっと視線を送る。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: “不过，这是个好机会，可以让您的随从充分发挥一下各自的能耐。如果错过了这个机会，那恐怕就太遗憾了。”{n}婕伊回头看了看。{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “不过，这是个好机会，可以让您的随从充分发挥一下各自的能耐。如果错过了这个机会，那恐怕就太遗憾了。”{n}婕伊回头看了看。{/n}
traits.speaker: JaeCompanion

languages.text: "Lakin maiyetindeki bazı kimselerin yeteneklerini görebilmek için harika bir fırsat bu, kaçırırsak yazık olur." {n}Jae, omzunun üstünden bir bakış atıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "However, it would be a shame to miss out on this opportunity to see the skills of certain members of your retinue in action." {n}Jae glances over her shoulder.{/n}
